## Overview

The final project gives you an opportunity to use and extend the methods we have learned in class to an environmental data set and/or model of your choosing. More details will be provided over the semester. We will discuss each component in class as well as providing relevant information on this page.

## Overall Instructions

- Students in 4850 should work in groups of 2-3, while students in 5850 must work alone.
